title: The Holy Year of 1950
creator_credit: United World Films and Castle Films
brief_description: St Peter’s Basilica setting for an inspiring series of religious functions in 1950. Pilgrims on their way to Rome attend the opening of the Holy Year 1950. Thousands of pilgrims attend open air mass in St Peter’s Square with Pope Pirest 12th. Shows the art and architecture of Rome.
